※PCGビットマップ(64×32ドット)向けライフゲーム
※VIDEO5(8×6文字＝64×48ドット)用
※この順でSaveして1ファイル目をRunして下さい


1ファイル目；

5 'GOL2PBV5_1
6 VIDEO5
10 POKE#AC0,0,32,0,35,0,36,37,0,0,38,45,66,6,208,1,45,4,208,2,45,2,208,237,30,118,28,246,231,130,9,151,1,199,27,2,180,0,33,18,66,4,209,54,66,9,209,64,33,73,1,6,224
11 POKE#AF4,31,42,4,209,2,46,2,209,64,33,73,1,73,66,63,66,3,209,45,66,6,209,64,49,4,224,63,47,2,209,2,45,0,209,64,57,10,0,2,188,23,24,127,25,64,37,110,67,191,25,65,63
12 POKE#B28,7,34,18,2,125,10,56,38,117,67,82,25,189,9,63,38,117,67,82,27,253,8,237,0,82,25,126,27,7,37,173,27,86,92,238,64,1,34,22,64,1,46,0,209,91,28,100,28,9,44,180,209
13 POKE#B5C,0,224,176,231,143,36,36,1,100,90,198,8,247,0,199,27,53,25,7,38,246,27,111,92,1,36,180,64,32,180,7,34,18,2,69,10,56,38,117,67,82,25,133,9,63,38,117,67,82,27,197,8
14 POKE#B90,237,0,82,25,70,27,7,37,173,27,86,92,238,64,1,34,22,64,32,188,1,46,7,209,3,43,9,208,4,43,7,208,255,34,84,64,39,64,2,224,3,43,1,209,39,67,111,84,64,28,66,9
15 POKE#BC4,64,42,202,209,112,71
20 LRUNFILE()+1


2ファイル目；

5 'GOL2PBV5_2
10 POKE#800,0,36,230,8,247,0,231,27,143,35,27,1,91,90,245,24,7,38,246,27,111,92,247,64,1,37,47,64,7,34,18,2,101,10,56,38,117,67,82,25,165,9,63,38,117,67,82,27,229,8,237,0
11 POKE#834,82,25,102,27,7,37,173,27,86,92,1,35,171,64,1,47,2,209,64,28,30,67,2,224,255,37,107,64,30,64,86,84,100,28,101,9,64,45,210,209,112,71
15 S=#9C0:B=#700
20 CLS:FORJ=0TO3:Y=8*J:POKE#908+#8*J,#E0+Y,#E1+Y,#E2+Y,#E3+Y,#E4+Y,#E5+Y,#E6+Y,#E7+Y:NEXT
25 LC0,0:?"GEN";:LC0,5:?"POP";
30 FORI=0TO255:POKES+I,0:POKEB+I,0:NEXT:Q=256+RND(426):T=0
35 C=0:G=RND(2048):M=G/8+S:F=7-G%8:R=PEEK(M):R=R|1<<F:POKEM,R:P=USR(#800,0):LC4,5:?DEC$(P,3);:IFP<QGOTO35
40 C=C+1:K=INKEY():CLK:IFK=9||BTN(0)=1||T=100GOTO20
42 Z=USR(#AC0,0):WAIT2:P=USR(#800,0):IFH=PT=T+1
45 LC3,0:?DEC$(C,4);:LC4,5:?DEC$(P,3);:H=P
50 GOTO40
